title: ReviewedShops
description:
Online shopping just got safer! Our Chrome widget helps you instantly see review counts for over 100,000 e-shops across 9 countries, making it easy to spot trustworthy stores. No tracking, no hassle - just smarter, more informed shopping decisions at a glance.

Supported countries: Slovakia, Czechia, Hungary, Romania, Croatia,Slovenia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Serbia.
